name: God Slayer (itch)
description:
Mini Jam 119: Heaven² :)

You're the last angel.

The ancient god has taken control of heaven.

Use your fists to destroy everything(literally everything), and use your sword to kill those fallen angels.

Find a way to get into the ancient god's room.

Face fear itself.

Menu, Gameover:

WASD- Move Arrow

E- Interact

Left Click- Destroy UI

Gameplay:

AD- Move

Left Shift- Roll

E- Interact

Q- Change Weapon

R- Use Potion

Using Fist: (Destroy almost everything)

Left Click- Attack(You can click two more times to do combo)

Middle Click- Uppercut

Right Click- Ground Smash 

Using Sword:

Left Click- Attack(You can click one more time to do combo)
